attributes.action: we want to stop david lammy calling on parliament to reject the eu result
attributes.additional_details: he was mentioning it on itv news and in the newspapers
attributes.background: because I believe the public voted out fairly and mps shouldn't be allowed to stop us getting out of the European union against our will

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for the individual views of particular MPs and how they are expressed to the media.
